title: How fast can you write a 10-page paper? - Quora

response.answer_text: Strange question, but having recently written one, I’m happy to answer! My coauthor and I set ourselves a ’24 hour paper challenge’ to see if we could take some data we’d analysed and write up the paper in 1 day. We wanted to do this to ‘dogfood’ the technology we've built. The paper is only 6 pages, but it was written up in 1 day. And we used Scholarcy to generate the abstract. You can read the paper here: A study’s got to know its limitations
What, pray tell, is your point?? How fast I can write something bears no relationship to how fast you can. So, as I said, what is your point with the question?
